doc:
Joanna Johnson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joanna_Johnson 0 Joanna Johnson (born December 31, 1961 in Phoenix, Arizona) is an American actress, writer and producer best known for her roles as Caroline Spencer Forrester (1987–1990, 2000-2001) and her twin sister, Karen Spencer (1991–1994, 2009, 2011–2014) on the CBS daytime soap opera The Bold and the Beautiful. She is an executive producer and writer on the Freeform's drama series The Fosters. Joanna_Johnson ( born December_31_,_1961 in Phoenix , Arizona ) is an_American_actress_,_writer_and_producer best_known for her_roles as Caroline_Spencer_Forrester ( 1987 – 1990 , 2000-2001 ) and her_twin_sister , Karen_Spencer ( 1991 – 1994_,_2009_,_2011 – 2014 ) on the_CBS_daytime_soap_opera The_Bold and the_Beautiful . She is an_executive_producer_and_writer on the_Freeform 's_drama_series The_Fosters .
